alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 11:17AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Suffolk County through NOON EDT... At 1117 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brookhaven National Laboratory, or near Middle Island, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Riverhead, Shirley, Medford, Southold, Manorville, Middle Island, Wading River, Center Moriches, Mattituck, Southampton, Westhampton, Sag Harbor, Bridgehampton, Coram and Mastic. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
